contactDetails.title: Contact Details
contactDetails.description: Complete the details for the relevant parties

legalRepresentative.title: Legal Representative of one of the above

noticeOfTransferAndCharge.title: Who accepts service of the Notice of Transfer & Charge?
noticeOfTransferAndCharge.description: Tick the box beside each party and state the total fee including VAT for notice of transfer and charge. Tick 'Notice via email' column to confirm whether you will accept notice via email.

otherDetailsRequired.title: Are details other than the incoming owner's name, address and lender name required?

details.title: If Yes, please detail required additional information to be included with the notice of disposition

collectsServiceCharges.title: Who collects, or will collect, the Service charge?

dealsWithDayToDayMaintenanceOfManagedAre.title: Who deals with, or will deal with, the day to day maintenance of the Managed Area?

organisesManagedAreaInsurance.title: Who organises and administers the insurance for the Managed Areas?

deedOfCovenantRequired.title: Is a Deed of Covenant Required?

costsApplicableToTheDeed.title: Confirm the costs applicable to the Deed including VAT

personWhoDealsWithTheDeedOfCovenant.title: Provide details of the person who deals with the Deed of Covenant

awareOfConsents.title: Are you aware of consent having been given to any alterations or additions to the Property?

details.title: Provide details and copies of any consent

requirementsToBeMemberOfManagementCompan.title: Is the incoming Owner required to take a share in, or become a member of, the Management Company?

details.title: Provide details of the procedure and fees

procedureForObtainingCertificate.title: What is the procedure and cost for obtaining a certificate in accordance with a restriction in the Proprietorship Register at the Land Registry, if applicable?

serviceChargePayable.title: What is the annual Service charge payable by this Property?
serviceChargePayable.description: This should include any sums payable for the maintenance of the managed area

hasFixedRentcharge.title: If there is also a ‘fixed’ Rentcharge, please confirm the amount and explain why.

serviceChargePaidUpToDate.title: Is the Service charge paid up-to-date?

lastDemandPeriod.title: What period is covered by the last demand?

propertiesContribute.title: How many properties contribute toward the maintenance of the Managed Area?
propertiesContribute.description: Stipulate the number of each applicable type of property

doAllPropertiesContribute.title: Do all properties in the Managed Area contribute to the Service Charge?

details.title: If No, provide details as to why not

excessPaymentAnticipated.title: Is any excess payment anticipated from the Property at the end of the financial year?

hasInabilityToCollectAffectedMaintenance.title: In the last 12 months, has any inability to collect payments, from any party, affected (or is it likely to affect), the maintenance of the Managed Area?

reserveFund.title: Does a Reserve Fund apply to the Managed Area?

amount.title: Confirm the amount collected held in the Reserve Fund

forTheManagedAreas.title: For the entirety of the Managed Areas.

sufficentToCoverKnownExpenditure.title: Is the amount expected to be sufficient to cover the known expenditure?

lastDecoratedPeriod.title: If parts of the Managed Areas require regular decoration confirm the date when the Managed Areas were last decorated, internally and externally.

worksProposed.title: Within the next 2 years, are any works proposed to the Managed Areas anticipated to require an additional contribution greater than £250 from the Owner?

details.title: If so, provide details of the works and the contribution anticipated from the Owner.

increaseInServiceChargeAnticipated.title: Is any increase in the Service Charge over 10% or £100, whichever is the greater, anticipated in the next 2 years?

outstandingServiceChargeConsultation.title: Where you operate Service charge consultation, are there any outstanding Service charge consultation procedures?

japaneseKnotweedAffectingManagedAreas.title: Are the Managed Areas known to be affected by Japanese knotweed or other invasive species?

details.title: Provide details and a copy of any invasive species management plan in place.

transferFees.title: Are there any transfer fees, deferred charges or similar fees, expressed as a percentage of the Property's value payable on an event such as resale or subletting?

premiumsPaidUpToDate.title: Are the buildings insurance premium contributions payable by the Owner paid up to date for the Managed Areas?

lastDemandPeriod.title: What period is covered by the last demand?

claimsMade.title: Have any claims been made against the policy during the last 3 years?

premiumIncludedInServiceCharge.title: Is the insurance premium included in the service charge?

details.title: Confirm the annual amount payable for the Property

standardTermsAvailable.title: Are you aware of any reason why comprehensive insurance will not be available on standard terms in future?

nonComplianceWithConditions.title: Are you aware of any non-compliance with the insurance conditions that would render the policy void?

unresolvedDisputes.title: Are there any documented unresolved disputes with the Owners of any of the properties in the Managed Area?

details.title: To the extent permitted by the UK General Data Protection Regulations, please supply details

breachOfTermsOfTransfer.title: Are you aware of any breach of the terms of the Transfer of this Property?

requiredDocuments.title: Required Documents
requiredDocuments.description: Please provide the following applicable documents:

serviceChargeAccounts.title: The last 3 years published Service Charge accounts.

managedAreasInsurancePolicy.title: Managed Areas insurance policy and schedule.

serviceChargeEstimatesCurrent.title: Service charge estimate for the current year and details of the anticipated payments on account for the Property.

serviceChargeEstimatesPrevious.title: Service charge estimate for the previous year for which accounts have not yet been prepared for the Property.

proposedWorksNotices.title: Copies of any notices served on the Owners in respect of any proposed works or any works which have not yet been paid for.

additionalRegulationsNotInTransfer.title: Any additional regulations or rules affecting the Property which are not contained in the transfer.

certificateOfCompliance.title: Any Certificate of Compliance required by a Restriction on the registered title.

permissionToAlter.title: Copy of any permission to alter the Property which has been issued.

noticesServedOnOwner.title: Copy of any known notices served on the Owner and documentation arising from them.

asbestosSurvey.title: Asbestos Survey for buildings part of the Managed Area built or converted before 2001.

managedAreaFireRiskAssessment.title: Fire Risk Assessment for communal areas in buildings forming part of the Managed Area.

memorandumAndArticles.title: Memorandum and Articles of Association of the Management Company.

managementCompanyAGMMinutes.title: Minutes from the last AGM for the Management Company.

feesForAdminServices.title: Menu of fees for your administrative services.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.description: By checking the box you are .

response.title: Declaration
response.description: I/we confirm that I am the person authorised to provide the information which I have completed in it on behalf of those parties which I have selected from the list, and that a buyer may rely on the information which I have supplied without applying to any other party except where I have left a section blank because I do not have the authority to provide the information

capacity.title: Please tick as applicable below, to confirm the capacity in which the answers are given.
